entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers changing to a few rain showers and flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 08:03 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to periods of snow this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 08:03 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
